area_title.title: Area
area_title.description: Multi-character area title associated with the area's FIPS code (Excluded from singlefile)

own_title.title: Own
own_title.description: Multi-character ownership title associated with the ownership code (Excluded from singlefile)

industry_title.title: Industry
industry_title.description: Multi-character industry title associated with the industry code (Excluded from singlefile)

agglvl_title.title: Aggregation Level
agglvl_title.description: Multi-character aggregation title associated with the agglvl code (Excluded from singlefile)

size_title.title: Size
size_title.description: Multi-character size title associated with the size code (Excluded from singlefile)

qtrly_estabs_count.title: Quarterly Establishments Count
qtrly_estabs_count.description: Count of establishments for a given quarter

month1_emplvl.title: Month1 Employment Level
month1_emplvl.description: Employment level for the first month of a given quarter

month2_emplvl.title: Month2 Employment Level
month2_emplvl.description: Employment level for the second month of a given quarter

month3_emplvl.title: Month3 Employment Level
month3_emplvl.description: Employment level for the third month of a given quarter

total_qtrly_wages.title: Total Quarterly Wages
total_qtrly_wages.description: Total wages for a given quarter

taxable_qtrly_wages.title: Taxable Quarterly Wages
taxable_qtrly_wages.description: Taxable wages for a given quarter

qtrly_contributions.title: Quarterly Contributions
qtrly_contributions.description: Quarterly contributions for a given quarter

avg_wkly_wage.title: Average Weekly Wage
avg_wkly_wage.description: Average weekly wage for a given quarter

lq_disclosure_code.title: Location Quotient Disclosure Code
lq_disclosure_code.description: 1-character location-quotient disclosure code (either ' '(blank) or 'N' not disclosed

lq_qtrly_estabs_count.title: Location Quotient Quarterly Establishment Count
lq_qtrly_estabs_count.description: Location quotient of the quarterly establishment count relative to the U.S. (Rounded to the hundredths place)

lq_month1_emplvl.title: Location Quotient Month1 Employment Level
lq_month1_emplvl.description: Location quotient of the emloyment level for the first month of a given quarter relative to the U.S. (Rounded to the hundredths place)

lq_month2_emplvl.title: Location Quotient Month2 Employment Level
lq_month2_emplvl.description: Location quotient of the emloyment level for the second month of a given quarter relative to the U.S. (Rounded to the hundredths place)

lq_month3_emplvl.title: Location Quotient Month3 Employment Level
lq_month3_emplvl.description: Location quotient of the emloyment level for the third month of a given quarter relative to the U.S. (Rounded to the hundredths place)

lq_total_qtrly_wages.title: Location Quotient Total Quarterly Wages
lq_total_qtrly_wages.description: Location quotient of the total wages for a given quarter relative to the U.S. (Rounded to the hundredths place)

lq_taxable_qtrly_wages.title: Location Quotient Taxable Quarterly Wages
lq_taxable_qtrly_wages.description: Location quotient of the total taxable wages for a given quarter relative to the U.S. (Rounded to the hundredths place)

lq_qtrly_contributions.title: Location Quotient Quarterly Contributions
lq_qtrly_contributions.description: Location quotient of the total contributions for a given quarter relative to the U.S. (Rounded to the hundredths place)

lq_avg_wkly_wage.title: Location Quotient Average Weekly Wage
lq_avg_wkly_wage.description: Location quotient of the average weekly wage for a given quarter relative to the U.S. (Rounded to the hundredths place)

oty_disclosure_code.title: OTY Disclosure Code
oty_disclosure_code.description: 1-character over-the-year disclosure code (either ' '(blank) or 'N' not disclosed)

oty_qtrly_estabs_count_chg.title: OTY Quarterly Establishments Count Change
oty_qtrly_estabs_count_chg.description: Over-the-year change in the count of establishments for a given quarter

oty_qtrly_estabs_count_pct_chg.title: OTY Quarterly Establishments Count Pct Change
oty_qtrly_estabs_count_pct_chg.description: Over-the-year percent change in the count of establishments for a given quarter (Rounded to the tenths place)

oty_month1_emplvl_chg.title: OTY Month1 Employment Level Change
oty_month1_emplvl_chg.description: Over-the-year change in the first month's employment level of a given quarter

oty_month2_emplvl_chg.title: OTY Month2 Employment Level Change
oty_month2_emplvl_chg.description: Over-the-year change in the second month's employment level of a given quarter

oty_month3_emplvl_chg.title: OTY Month3 Employment Level Change
oty_month3_emplvl_chg.description: Over-the-year change in the third month's employment level of a given quarter

oty_total_qtrly_wages_chg.title: OTY Total Quarterly Wages Change
oty_total_qtrly_wages_chg.description: Over-the-year change in total quarterly wages for a given quarter

oty_taxable_qtrly_wages_chg.title: OTY Taxable Quarterly Wages Change
oty_taxable_qtrly_wages_chg.description: Over-the-year change in taxable quarterly wages for a given quarter

oty_qtrly_contributions_chg.title: OTY Quarterly Contributions Change
oty_qtrly_contributions_chg.description: Over-the-year change in quarterly contributions for a given quarter

oty_avg_wkly_wage_chg.title: OTY Average Weekly Wage Change
oty_avg_wkly_wage_chg.description: Over-the-year change in average weekly wage for a given quarter
